ACWN.DE.summary: A.S. CrÃ©ation Tapeten AG, through its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells wallpapers worldwide. It operates through two segments, Wallpaper and Furnishing Fabrics. The Wallpaper segment produces and markets wallpapers and borders. The Furnishing Fabrics segment markets curtains and furnishing fabrics. The company offers its wallpapers primarily under the innova, A.S. CrÃ©ation, livingwalls, and Architects Paper brand names; and decorative fabrics under the Indes and Fuggerhaus brand names. It also provides various services, such as departmental planning, shop-fitting, ordering, decoration, individual marketing concept, sales promotional package, and concepts for point-of-sale services, as well as delivery services. A.S. CrÃ©ation Tapeten AG was founded in 1974 and is headquartered in Gummersbach, Germany.

VIB3.DE.summary: Villeroy & Boch AG, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells ceramic products primarily under the Villeroy & Boch brand in Germany, rest of Europe, and internationally. It operates through Bathroom and Wellness, and Tableware divisions. The Bathroom and Wellness division manufactures ceramic sanitary ware, ceramic kitchen sinks, bathroom furniture, bathtubs and shower tubs, whirlpools, bath and kitchen fittings, and accessories. It also provides shower toilets, installation systems, outdoor system pools and accessories, and others. The Tableware division offers tableware, crystal/glass and cutlery, and accessories, as well as kitchen and tableware textiles, and gift articles. The company also provides lighting, flooring, and furniture products for living, dining, and sleeping areas; and kitchen furniture products. It sells its products through a network of approximately 90 Villeroy & Boch stores and 500 points of sale facilities at department stores, as well as through its online shops. The company serves dealers, craftsmen, architects, interior designers, planners, porcelain retailers, department store chains, e-commerce providers, investors, office buildings, hotels, and residential complexes, as well as operators of hotels and restaurants. Villeroy & Boch AG was founded in 1748 and is headquartered in Mettlach, Germany.

WEW.DE.summary: Westwing Group AG, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the home and living ecommerce business. The company operates through two segments, DACH and International. It offers textile products, rugs, home dÃ©cor and accessories, kitchen and dining products, lighting products, furniture products, and other products. The company provides its products under own and private label, and third-party brands. It has operations in 11 European countries, including Germany, Switzerland, Austria, Spain, Italy, France, Poland, the Czech Republic, Slovakia, Belgium, and the Netherlands. The company was incorporated in 2011 and is headquartered in Munich, Germany.

WUG.F.summary: Westag & Getalit AG manufactures and sells wooden products for interior finishing and building construction. The company offers wooden doors, frames, kitchen worktops, window sills, laminates, direct coatings, coated plywood panels, solid surface materials, formworks, industrial panels, and vehicle panels. It distributes its products worldwide. The company was founded in 1901 and is based in Rheda-WiedenbrÃ¼ck, Germany. Westag & Getalit AG is a subsidiary of Broadview Industries AG.
